packages.title: Anniversary Balloon Decoration
packages.description: Celebrate your anniversary with a beautiful balloon decoration.
inclusion: 60 Chrome Balloons [40 Purple and 40 Silver, will stick on wall as bunches]
30-40 Balloons will be Stick on the ceiling with removable paper tapes
"Happy Birthday" Occasion Foil Banner
2 Star Foils [16 inch]
Ribbons to hang with balloons
Inclusive of all taxes and conveyance charges
additionalOptions: You can add more material in the package by paying separately
Balloons color can be changed as per your choice
